subsection.name: Managing Dependencies
subsection.p: A component type can declare dependencies on services provided by other components. Merlin will ensure that dependencies are resolved prior to creation of the dependent component. Dependencies are declared in the component xinfo resource and supplied by Merlin to the component using the Avalon Serviceable interface.
Resources supporting this tutorial are contained in the turorials/dependencies/auto package.
